Sentencas: In this study, two short SOE stacks (6-cells) were characterized in steam-electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: The first was based on Ni-YSZ supported cells with LSCF-based air electrodes.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: The second included LSC-based air electrodes specifically developed within the SOFC600 project.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: The stacks were fed with a 90% steam, 10% hydrogen mixture, and characterized between 600 and 700 degrees C. For the LSCF-based stack, an average cell voltage of 1.6V was reached at -1Acm(-2) and 700 degrees C, corresponding to 60% steam conversion.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: The LSC-based stack showed better performances, with 1.25V at -0.8Acm(-2) and 700 degrees C. Durability tests were performed around the thermoneutral voltage (1.35V) for resp.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks
Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: The average stack degradation rates were resp.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks
Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: Twelve load-cycles were also performed on the LSC-stack with no apparent degradation.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: In addition, co-electrolysis was performed between 750 and 850 degrees C by feeding the stack with a 60% H2O, 30% CO2, and 10% H-2 mixture.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: Ninety-five percent conversion was reached and the measured outlet syngas composition was close to that predicted by thermodynamics.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: Steam electrolysis tests were carried out in the same conditions for comparison.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks

Sentencas: The stack performance in the co-electrolysis mode was slightly lower than in the electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Electrolysis and Co-Electrolysis Performance of SOE Short Stacks
